Our Approach

“The H.I.M. Recruiters Way”

We remain in close contact with you at every step, keeping you informed of our progress.

Our approach begins with the development of an action plan based upon our expert analysis of your needs. We perform searches on both a contingency and retained basis by utilizing our database of thousands of H.I.M. professionals and employers to meet your needs.

You benefit from Perry’s extensive professional network represented by his thirty plus years of experience and his “Fellow” status through the American Health Information Management Association (AHIMA).

Beyond this impressive experience and networking, H.I.M. Recruiters advertises, searches, interviews and checks references and credentials at no cost to you.

When it comes to recruiting in-demand professionals during periods of severe shortages, it takes one to find one.

The competitive advantages of working with H.I.M. Recruiters are numerous. We look forward to working with you on your specific placement requirements and helping you as we have so many others.
